cause.description:
This is a humanitarian group with a mission to inform communities nationwide about the tragedies of war and occupation; in the Middle-East, Africa and World-Wide. Together we can make a difference by educating ourselves and informing others on ways to help. United we can end a war, discrimination and genocide on people who wish and pray for peace and life.
1. Position #1
cause.mission: To End Occupation and War - Life, Liberty and Justice FOR ALL
cause.name: United
